main_definition: The term 'mounts' refers to the action of putting something in place or onto another thing, as well as a measure of size, quantity, or amount.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To attach or fasten one object on top of another
meanings_and_examples.example: The car has custom-made decals mounted on its exterior.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Measurement indicating the quantity, size, or amount
meanings_and_examples.example: There are several mounts to choose from when selecting a new television stand.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An increase in numbers or magnitude over time
meanings_and_examples.example: The number of cases mounting up due to the pandemic is alarming.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To climb or ascend using another object for support
meanings_and_examples.example: Mountaineers use ropes and ladders as mounts to reach higher altitudes.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A device used to hold equipment in place, such as a camera tripod
meanings_and_examples.example: The photographer set up their camera on the mount before capturing images of wildlife.
